content: reach kerchief body first tie completed slip_stitch in ea single_crochet across top of kerchief chain 65 slip_stitch in ea chain across until you reach kerchief body second tie completed join with slip_stitch to top right corner st on kerchief fasten_off and weave in tails copyright 2017 2010 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes
